physical_examinations.vital_signs: Temperature: 38.8°C; Blood Pressure: 147/82 mm Hg; Pulse: 110 bpm; Respiratory Rate: 22 breaths/min; Oxygen Saturation: 97%
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Pharynx erythematous; tonsils erythematous and enlarged with crypt abscesses; bilateral anterior cervical lymphadenopathy; pustular rash on the face and torso.

Pustular rash on face and torso; erythematous ulcers on lips and hard palate; tonsils had white erosions on a red base; submandibular, cervical, and inguinal lymphadenopathy; scattered pink papules and plaques on trunk, thighs, and buttocks; multiple raised erythematous nodules on shins.
